Paul May

Home Tags About

Hello, my name is Paul May. I’m VP of Design at the software supply chain company Cloudsmith.

About Me

I’ve worked with Frog Design and Monokoto for clients including Apple, Beats, Coloplast, Comcast, Denon, Ferrosan Medical Devices, Fritz Hansen, Marantz, Nordic Capical, GN Hearing, the UK Government, Virgin Atlantic.

I spent a little while at the Royal College of Art in London, helping students with interaction design and electronics projects. I learned as much from them as they did from me.

At Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center I worked on their implementation of IBM Watson, and co-founded a cross-disciplinary data science + product development team,

I studied at DCU in Dublin, and attended NYU as a Fulbright Scholar.

You can contact me at hello@paulmay.org
